about_the_game:
This DLC for the game Galaxy Girls includes two packages.

1. Dakimakura Viewer


Once installed it will give you access to the Dakimakuras as images to view inside the game itself.

2. Digital Wallpaper Pack


In addition this includes the complete set of all four high resolution digital Dakimakura designs of the four main female characters of the Galaxy Girls game, created by Kopi Anget. The pack of dakimakuras will download to a directory within the game folder.

This DLC is included as part of the Deluxe Edition Bundle
detailed_description:
This DLC for the game Galaxy Girls includes two packages.

1. Dakimakura Viewer


Once installed it will give you access to the Dakimakuras as images to view inside the game itself.

2. Digital Wallpaper Pack


In addition this includes the complete set of all four high resolution digital Dakimakura designs of the four main female characters of the Galaxy Girls game, created by Kopi Anget. The pack of dakimakuras will download to a directory within the game folder.

This DLC is included as part of the Deluxe Edition Bundle

  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: The DLC pack contains all digital dakimakuras of the characters from the game as well as an in-game daki viewer.
